7 CADToPointCloud::CADToPointCloud(const std::string &cad_path,
8  const std::string &cad_file,
9  PointCloudXYZ::Ptr cloud)
10 {
11  setPCpath(cad_path);
12 
13  if (CADToMesh(cad_path+cad_file) == 0) // here we get _CAD_mesh
14  {
15  if(MeshToPointCloud(_CAD_mesh)==0) // here we get _CAD_cloud
16  {
17  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_CAD_cloud, *cloud);
18  ROS_INFO("File converted");
19  }
20  }
21 }

38 int CADToPointCloud::CADToMesh(const std::string &cad_file_path)
39 {
40  pcl::PolygonMesh mesh;
41  pcl::io::loadPolygonFile(cad_file_path,mesh);
42 
43  int len = mesh.cloud.row_step * mesh.cloud.height;
44  if (len == 0)
45  return -1;
46 
47  *_CAD_mesh = mesh;
48 
49  return 0;
50 }

82 {
83  pcl_conversions::fromPCL( mesh->cloud, _CAD_cloud_msg);
84  _CAD_cloud_msg.header.frame_id = Utils::_frame_id;

95 
133 void CADToPointCloud::uniform_sampling(vtkSmartPointer<vtkPolyData> polydata, size_t n_samples, PointCloudXYZ &cloud_out)
134 {
135  polydata->BuildCells();
136  vtkSmartPointer<vtkCellArray> cells = polydata->GetPolys();
137 
138  double p1[3], p2[3], p3[3], totalArea = 0;
139  std::vector<double> cumulativeAreas(cells->GetNumberOfCells(), 0);
140  size_t i = 0;
141  vtkIdType npts = 0, *ptIds = NULL;
142  for (cells->InitTraversal(); cells->GetNextCell(npts, ptIds); i++)
143  {
144  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[0], p1);
145  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[1], p2);
146  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[2], p3);
147  totalArea += vtkTriangle::TriangleArea(p1, p2, p3);
148  cumulativeAreas[i] = totalArea;
149  }
150 
151  cloud_out.points.resize(n_samples);
152  cloud_out.width = static_cast<pcl::uint32_t>(n_samples);
153  cloud_out.height = 1;
154 
155  for (i = 0; i < n_samples; i++)
156  {
157  Eigen::Vector4f p;
158  randPSurface(polydata, &cumulativeAreas, totalArea, p);
159  cloud_out.points[i].x = p[0];
160  cloud_out.points[i].y = p[1];
161  cloud_out.points[i].z = p[2];
162  }
163 }
164 
165 
166 void CADToPointCloud::randPSurface(vtkPolyData *polydata, std::vector<double> *cumulativeAreas, double totalArea, Eigen::Vector4f &p)
167 {
168  float r = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()) * totalArea);
169 
170  std::vector<double>::iterator low = std::lower_bound(cumulativeAreas->begin(), cumulativeAreas->end(), r);
171  vtkIdType el = vtkIdType(low - cumulativeAreas->begin());
172 
173  double A[3], B[3], C[3];
174  vtkIdType npts = 0;
175  vtkIdType *ptIds = NULL;
176  polydata->GetCellPoints(el, npts, ptIds);
177  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[0], A);
178  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[1], B);
179  polydata->GetPoint(ptIds[2], C);
180  randomPointTriangle(float(A[0]), float(A[1]), float(A[2]),
181  float(B[0]), float(B[1]), float(B[2]),
182  float(C[0]), float(C[1]), float(C[2]), p);
183 }
184 
185 double CADToPointCloud::uniform_deviate(int seed)
186 {
187  double ran = seed * (1.0 / (RAND_MAX + 1.0));
188  return ran;
189 }
190 
191 void CADToPointCloud::randomPointTriangle(float a1, float a2, float a3, float b1, float b2, float b3, float c1, float c2, float c3, Eigen::Vector4f &p)
192 {
193  float r1 = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()));
194  float r2 = static_cast<float>(uniform_deviate(rand()));
195  float r1sqr = sqrtf(r1);
196  float OneMinR1Sqr = (1 - r1sqr);
197  float OneMinR2 = (1 - r2);
198  a1 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
199  a2 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
200  a3 *= OneMinR1Sqr;
201  b1 *= OneMinR2;
202  b2 *= OneMinR2;
203  b3 *= OneMinR2;
204  c1 = r1sqr * (r2 * c1 + b1) + a1;
205  c2 = r1sqr * (r2 * c2 + b2) + a2;
206  c3 = r1sqr * (r2 * c3 + b3) + a3;
207  p[0] = c1;
208  p[1] = c2;
209  p[2] = c3;
210  p[3] = 0;
211 }
